home.title: Welcome to the Cherry Admin Panel!
home.description1:
This web application is the management center for your Cherry VM Manager.
Its purpose is to provide user-friendly experience in controling deployed machines.
home.description2: For advanced configurations, you might want to enter the dependancy panels:

cherry-admin-panel.feature1: Monitor your Virtual Machines and their activity.
cherry-admin-panel.feature3: Configure network connections between your machines.

guacamole.title: Apache Guacamole Panel
guacamole.description: Apache Guacamole is a free and open-source, cross-platform, clientless remote desktop gateway maintained by the Apache Software Foundation.

traefik.title: Traefik Proxy Panel
traefik.description: Traefik is the leading open-source reverse proxy and load balancer for HTTP and TCP-based applications.

login.title: Cherry Admin Panel
login.description: Log in with an authorized CVMM account

credits.site-description: This website is developed using <1>React</1>, incorporating components from the <3>Mantine</3> library. The network panel is built on the <5>React Flow component</5>. Icons used are sourced from <7>Tabler Icons</7>.
